properties.title: Padding
properties.name: padding
properties.info: Internal space around container in pixels, em, or rem. Goes in order of top, right, bottom, left or top and bottom, left and right.

properties.title: Margin
properties.name: margin
properties.info: External space around container in pixels, ems, or rems. Goes in order of top, right, bottom, left or top and bottom, left and right.

properties.title: Width
properties.name: width
properties.info: Width of container in percentages, pixels, em, or rem.

properties.title: Height
properties.name: height
properties.info: Height of container in percentages, pixels, em, or rem.
